name: hoople2
short_description:
This is the project page for hoople2 which was retired on January 14th 2012.
Most of the code from hoople2 has moved into the Feisty Meow® Concerns Ltd codebase, available at http://feistymeow.org for your enjoyment.

======

HOOPLE stands for Hierarchical Object-Oriented Programming Language Extensions.    hoople consists mainly of C++ class libraries, but it also includes a set of useful applications based on the hoople libraries.    Version 2 of hoople, the second incarnation of the library, is being refactored for clarity, agility, reliability, and maintainability.
